description: This source file defines a health check endpoint using Flask and Flask-Smorest. It creates a Blueprint with a route that responds with a message indicating system health status.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class that handles GET requests for the health check endpoint.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to return a health status message.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
